properties.areaDesc: West Central Mountains; Baker County; Upper Weiser River; Boise Mountains
properties.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 8 at 2:44PM MST until January 12 at 2:00PM MST by NWS Boise ID
properties.description:
...HEAVY SNOW TO IMPACT THE AREA...

.A series of troughs will begin to impact the region Friday
bringing potentially significant accumulations for higher
elevations through the weekend.

* WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10
inches for lower elevations with 15 to 30 inches over the
mountains possible. Highest mountain peaks could see upwards of
60 inches.

* WHERE...West Central Mountains and Boise Mountains in Idaho as
well as the Upper Weiser River and Baker County in Oregon.

* WHEN...From Friday morning through Sunday afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible.
properties.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON
